name: rAr
description:
STORY

A boy is walking heavily toward a certain place. The boy steps lamenting and suffering. There are no people who he can believe...He can only pray to God. A place where this boy is heading is -- A school.

The boy arrives at the school with thoughts of suffering. At the same time, this boy begins to have a certain thought in his mind.

......Something is wrong at this school......

Unknown person...... Unusual school......
What does the boy think and do in this school? A story which the boy's life is changed dramatically is now beginning.

CONTENTS
  • Puzzle game -- Obey them, make them obey, solve puzzles --
  • Various gimmicks
  • More than 100 stages
  • Various minigames

For details of this game, please refer to a below movie!

CONTROLS

Move : Up/Down/Right/Left key

Interact : Space key

Menu : M key

Back to Title : F2 key

Quit : ESC key

Others : Described in the game
